snippet: The British bank said its operating profit rose 4 percent to $1.9 billion in the first three months of this year, as the nationalized firm was close to repaying all its government-backed emergency loans.
abstract: The British bank said its operating profit rose 4 percent to $1.9 billion in the first three months of this year, as the nationalized firm was close to repaying all its government-backed emergency loans.

headline.main: Royal Bank of Scotland Records Strong First-Quarter Results
